verses.verse: Not unto us<WH3068>, O Lord, not unto us<WH8034>, but unto your name give<WH5414> glory<WH3519>, for your mercy<WH2617>, and for your truth<WH571>'s sake.
Therefore should the heathen<WH1471> say<WH559>, Where is now their God<WH430>?
But our God<WH430> is in the heavens<WH8064>: he has done<WH6213> whatever he has pleased<WH2654>.
Their idols<WH6091> are silver<WH3701> and gold<WH2091>, the work<WH4639> of men<WH120>'s hands<WH3027>.
They have mouths<WH6310>, but they speak<WH1696> not<WH5869>: eyes have they<WH7200>, but they see not:
They have ears<WH241>, but they hear<WH8085> not<WH639>: noses have they<WH7306>, but they smell not:
They have hands<WH3027>, but they handle<WH4184> not<WH7272>: feet have they<WH1980>, but they walk not<WH1897>: neither speak they through their throat<WH1627>.
They that make<WH6213> them are like unto them<WH982>; so is every one that trusts in them.
O Israel<WH3478>, trust<WH982> you in the Lord<WH3068>: he is their help<WH5828> and their shield<WH4043>.
O house<WH1004> of Aaron<WH175>, trust<WH982> in the Lord<WH3068>: he is their help<WH5828> and their shield<WH4043>.
You that fear<WH3373> the Lord<WH3068>, trust<WH982> in the Lord<WH3068>: he is their help<WH5828> and their shield<WH4043>.
The Lord<WH3068> has been mindful<WH2142> of us<WH1288>: he will bless us<WH1288>; he will bless the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>; he will bless<WH1288> the house<WH1004> of Aaron<WH175>.
He will bless<WH1288> them that fear<WH3373> the Lord<WH3068>, both small<WH6996> and great<WH1419>.
The Lord<WH3068> shall increase<WH3254> you more and more<WH1121>, you and your sons.
You are blessed<WH1288> of the Lord<WH3068> which made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776>.
The heaven<WH8064>, even the heavens<WH8064>, are the Lord<WH3068>'s: but the earth<WH776> has he given<WH5414> to the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120>.
The dead<WH4191> praise<WH1984> not the Lord<WH3050>, neither any that go down<WH3381> into silence<WH1745>.
But we will bless<WH1288> the Lord<WH3050> from this time forth and for<WH5704> evermore<WH5769>. Praise<WH1984> the Lord<WH3050>.
